Interpretation.desc: Every keyword/function that makes the program 'understand' the input

function.name: figureValueType
function.desc: The function gets a value string and returns a char that indicates the value type eg. string, integer

function.name: stripString
function.desc: The function gets a spaced string and removes all the spaces

Strings.desc: Every keyword/function that's related to string formatting

function.name: isReservedWord
function.desc: Returns true if word is reserved word
